meta-description: Naufal Saif is a Web Developer who masters Codeigniter, Laravel, Next.js and provides website creation services
deskripsi-tentang-saya: Hello, let me introduce myself. My name is M Naufal Saif Alfauzan. I live in Bogor and currently I am studying at Bina Insani University, majoring in Informatics Engineering. I am a junior web developer who is passionate about creating creative solutions through website development. I have a strong interest in learning the latest technologies and implementing them in my projects. I hope to continue growing in this field and make meaningful contributions. Thank you!
timeline-1: Attended SMK ALBAHRI Bekasi City, majoring in Software Engineering.
timeline-2: Studying at Bina Insani University Bekasi City, majoring in Informatics Engineering.
